text: oh that's really interesting... he says he basically just scales his file up and down throughout his workflow
Yes. If there's an easy way to that it feels like a good workflow.
seems like his photoshop actions are the ticket
Specially if you're using a rMBP and use an external monitor.
also apparently he is building a UI design tool <http://bjango.com/mac/skala/>
Yes, he's been talking about it for over a year. Hope he doesn't abandon the project.
Just a general word  to anyone that will design for the iPhone 6 Plus in the future... it sucks. And it's weird.
i've been reading that "app design workflow" and playing with the actions all lunch, and I can't figure it out
I think melissa and I figured some things out but we're flying blind at this point. I don't think I'll really understand it until some dev tells me that I got it wrong.
Update those Bjango PS actions to 3.0 version and you can get a template/guide setup generated to help you with different sizes. <http://bjango.com/articles/actions/>
